about_the_game:
In a city of Polombia there have been many demonstrations due to injustices and abuses committed by the government and its Tombos.
A government run by an evil pig that turns all good cops into despicable Tombos.
These Tombos learn to abuse power, mistreating the people and getting away with it, turning more and more into despicable pigs.

In the game you are going to play the role of a corrupt Tombo that abuses power, you must hit the citizens but be careful, the citizens are tired of police abuse and they will defend themselves and claim their rights; They will attack you by hitting and throwing empanadas. Don't let anyone escape!

As the game progresses you will become more and more corrupt and you will be able to evolve and become an increasingly pig Tombo.

When you collect enough points and you must face the evil Pig, it is located in the main square of the city.

Do not forget to collect bribes and other objects that appear on the map to recover your energy, you can also perform missions to increase your score faster.

content_descriptors.notes: This game touches on a topic of social and political criticism, therefore it is not recommended for children.

detailed_description:
In a city of Polombia there have been many demonstrations due to injustices and abuses committed by the government and its Tombos.
A government run by an evil pig that turns all good cops into despicable Tombos.
These Tombos learn to abuse power, mistreating the people and getting away with it, turning more and more into despicable pigs.

In the game you are going to play the role of a corrupt Tombo that abuses power, you must hit the citizens but be careful, the citizens are tired of police abuse and they will defend themselves and claim their rights; They will attack you by hitting and throwing empanadas. Don't let anyone escape!

As the game progresses you will become more and more corrupt and you will be able to evolve and become an increasingly pig Tombo.

When you collect enough points and you must face the evil Pig, it is located in the main square of the city.

Do not forget to collect bribes and other objects that appear on the map to recover your energy, you can also perform missions to increase your score faster.
name: Tombo Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: The government of the evil pig and its Tombos have taken over Polombia
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, English
*languages with full audio support
